message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose we take $60 and you get $40. Think carefully, the money loses value with each round!
Alice, your offer was a bit too tilted in your favor. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 55/45 split.  Time is money, and money is losing value!
Bob, it seems we're both feeling the pinch of inflation. I'll meet you halfway - let's split it 55/45, with me taking the slightly larger share. This is my final offer.
